We are to be consecrated channels, through which the heavenly life is to flow to others. The Holy Spirit is to animate and pervade the whole church, purifying and cementing hearts. Those who have been buried with Christ in baptism are to rise to newness of life. . . . Upon us is laid a sacred charge. The commission has been given us: "Go therefore and make disciples of all nations" (Matthew 28:19, RSV). . . . You are dedicated to the work of making known the gospel of salvation. Heaven's perfection is to be your power (Testimonies, vol. 9, pp. 19-21).
